# init(scale:bias:)

**Initializer**

Returns a new fused quantization parameters structure.

## Declaration

```swift
init(scale: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor?, bias: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor?)
```

## Parameters

- **scale**: The descriptor of the scale.
- **bias**: The descriptor of the bias.
title: init(scale:bias:)
